channel.title: Dds glitch
channel.description: When i spec with dds and i switch weapon to ags while speccing it gives you much higher hits. How can i fix this?

item.title: Dds glitch
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

[quote=“pk pure g0d, post:5, topic:387011”][quote author=Ashton51 link=topic=482807.msg3535735#msg3535735 date=1300554539]

In your WearItem class

Can you explain what i need to do in wearitem class?

Depends on how your dds special attack is being handled.

In most PIs I believe it uses a boolean called special and sets it to true when you are dds specing. In the WearItem class find

and under that add something like

or whatever the boolean is called.
[/quote]

But if i do that i always need to click on the player again when i switch a weapon…[/quote]
No, just delete

but add what I told you in the same spot where that was…
All it will do is make it so when you switch weapons it stops using the spec, Also you should do specaccuracy = 1; and specdamage = 1; or whatever the integers are called.

Read full topic

Depends on how your dds special attack is being handled.

In most PIs I believe it uses a boolean called special and sets it to true when you are dds specing. In the WearItem class find

and under that add something like

or whatever the boolean is called.[/quote]

But if i do that i always need to click on the player again when i switch a weapon…
